page_content:
# Zoning Permits Section

__

#### Department of Planning and Development Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Our offices are open 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Monday through Friday. 

__

703-222-1082 TTY 711

__

dpdzoningpermits@fairfaxcounty.gov

__

12055 Government Center Parkway, Suite 250  
Fairfax, VA 22035

__

Leslie Johnson  
Zoning Administrator

metadata.description: Fairfax County, Virginia - Nonresidential Use Permits - NONRUP. The certificate of use and occupancy requirements for commercial occupancies located in Fairfax County, VA.
